nodes.text: Dor'shan was the capital of the planet Dorin. It was also the home of the temple of the Baran Do. The city contained small and isolated buildings, designs ranged from domes, trapezoids, and ziggurats, all built to withstand the brutal storms. Many colored lights illuminated the city of squat buildings, many engraved with geometric and organic patterns.
The spaceport consisted of several domed docks; all unloading areas were inside, to keep safe those not native to the world from the poisonous gases of the atmosphere.
